title: Don't Let Your Seedlings Suffer!   The Ultimate Guide to Thinning and Transplanting

tasks.task: Determine optimal spacing for seedlings during the thinning process.
subtasks: Assess the number of seedlings in a small cell.
Compare the observed number against recommended spacing.
Identify overcrowded seedlings competing for resources.
Remove excess seedlings to prevent weakness and spindly growth.
Repeat thinning as necessary over several weeks.
